jobDescription: Job DescriptionThe Opportunity We are seeking talented candidates with a desire to work in a vibrant workplace and passionate about what we do. This position will report to the Head of Technical Unit.  The selected candidate will be self-motivated, and a fast learner, with the ability to take initiative and multi-task under tight deadlines. Those who thrive in this role will challenge themselves to improve corporate operations to take their career and the company to the next level. You will play a significant role in the growth of the company and maintain cross-functional relationships with business and technical teams to ensure efficiency.
